definition[0]: the facts and details about a job, property, legal case etc
example[0]: For further particulars, contact the College secretary.
example[1]: Send your particulars  (=details such as your name, address, profession etc) to the address above.
example[2]: You may be required to give particulars of the change in your financial position.
definition[1]: facts and details about a person, event etc
example[3]: The company couldn’t comment on particulars because it hadn’t seen all the documents.
example[4]: An employee is entitled to a written statement containing particulars of the terms of the employment.
